text: Last night at midnight, The Weeknd ( real name : Abel Tesfaye ) surprise - dropped a new six - track album, My Dear Melancholy. While the bulk of it seems to be about his breakups with Selena Gomez and Bella Hadid, the clearest Gomez track seems to be the album's opening number, ` ` Call Out My Name''. The song describes the pain The Weeknd went through when they split at the end of October because he still loved her, and at one point even suggests The Weeknd nearly donated his kidney to her (!! ).
